Uses of Avatar in jbb.engine
 

Subclasses of Avatar in jbb.engine
 class Hero
          Hero is the user controlled character in the game.
 class NPC
          The NPC is an Avatar that generally has the primary goal of ruining the life of the hero by attempting to kill it.

Methods in jbb.engine.mouseland with parameters of type Avatar
 boolean MouseHero.collidesWith(Avatar avatar)
          the collidesWith method uses the parameter avatar and checks to see if MouseHero an instance of Mouse and if it is, it will remove a life of the Mouse Hero
 boolean Mouse.collidesWith(Avatar avatar)
          the collidesWith method uses the parameter avatar and checks to see if the Mouse is an instance of MouseHero and if it is, it will remove a life of the Mouse Hero
 boolean MouseTrap.pickedUp(Avatar avatar)
          If the parameter avatar is of instance Mouse and the the MouseTrap is set, remove a life from the mouse and deactivate the MouseTrap.
